document.full_text: syrian forces fought gunmen in battles that left more than 120 members of the security forces dead, state television said in the first report of large-scale armed clashes in the revolt against president bashar al-assad.
document.title: syria to send in army after 120 troops killed
lines_and_colors: syrian forces fought gunmen in battles that left more than 120 members of the security forces dead, state television said in the first report of large-scale armed clashes in the revolt against president bashar al-assad.
